name: 0afb5b21-7583-57d8-a227-e61fbf6b18f3
notes: The resource is the part of the Polish Corpus of Wrocław University of Technology (fully available on the website http://nlp.pwr.wroc.pl/kpwr). The documents within this collection are the samples of the Polish Wikipedia articles manually annotated on the level of chunks and selected predicate-argument relations, named entities, relations between named entities, anaphora relations and word senses.
title: Wikipedia articles extracted from Polish Corpus of Wrocław University of Technology
